id.description: The unique identifier of the document.

fileName.description: The name of the file associated with the document.

uploadDate.description: The date the document was uploaded to the system.

esignDate.description: The date the document was e-signed.

category.description: The category that the document belongs to.

isPrivate.description: Determines if the document is private to the employee.

isPublishedToEmployee.description: Determines if the document is published to all employees.

isOnboardingDocument.description: Determines if the document is an onboarding document.

employeeId.description: The unique identifier for the employee.

companyId.description: The unique identifier for the company.

isSignedDocument.description: Determines if the document was e-signed.

uploadedBy.description: The name of the user that uploaded the document.

isLegacyDocument.description: Determines if the document is a legacy document.

isEsignatureDocument.description: Determines if the document is an e-signature document.

isHelloSignDocument.description: Determines if the document is a HelloSign document.
